Types

orxOBOX {...}{.bycopy.} = object
  vPosition*: orxVECTOR        ## Position vector  : 12
  vPivot*: orxVECTOR           ## Pivot vector     : 24
  vX*: orxVECTOR               ## X axis vector    : 36
  vY*: orxVECTOR               ## Y axis vector    : 48
  vZ*: orxVECTOR               ## Z axis vector    : 60
